Functions
Clear_ISTD_Table_Click
Public Sub Clear_ISTD_Table_Click()
Description

Function that controls what happens when the following button is left clicked.

The following pop up box will appear. Asking the users which column to clear.

Convert_To_Nanomolar_Click
Public Sub Convert_To_Nanomolar_Click()
Description

Function that controls what happens when the following button is left clicked.

ISTD_Conc_[nM] and Custom_Units will be calculated abnd output to their repective columns.

The ISTD_Conc_[nM] columns and  Custom_Units cells will be coloured green when when the row has either a valid Transition_Name_ISTD, ISTD_Conc_[ng/mL] and ISTD_[MW] or a valid Transition_Name_ISTD and ISTD_Conc_[nM]

Columns and rows will turn green when the button "Convert to nM and Verify" is pressed when either both ISTD_Conc_[nM] and ISTD_[MW] is entered or the ISTD_Conc_[nM] is entered. Custom units will be automatically calculated.
